plot: Nanako Matsutaka is an innocent university student who is participating in a sexual perversion seminar led by the deviant professor Kenji Meshiya. She desperately tries to keep her morals as well as her sanity while amidst the strange group of students in the study group.
opening_theme: "Mania e Kirakira" (マニアエキラキラ) by Kana Hanazawa
ending_theme: "Hen ・ Rin ・ Sham ~Hen da yo. Rinse no ato ni Shampoo te~" (変・リン・シャン ~変だよ。リンスーの後にシャンプーて~) by Kana Hanazawa, Minoru Shiraishi, Norihisa Mori & Takashi Matsuyama
